Your daily dose of crypto.
Moonly is a web extension that allows you to stay up to date with the crypto market as soon as you open a new tab.
The extension is connected to the Binance websocket in order to retrieve the price of Cryptocurrencies in real time.
Twenty of them are displayed in real time with the live stock values.
